ability_list.name: Bear hug
ability_list.description: If a victim is hit by both paws in the same round, the bear hugs for an extra 2d8 automatic damage.

ability_list.name: Defensive
ability_list.description: Adults will protect their young with their lives, but otherwise only attack if cornered.
